worldWidth.description: Width of the simulation world in pixels.

worldHeight.description: Height of the simulation world in pixels.

detectionRadius.description: Radius within which Red actors can detect Blue actors.

defenseRadius.description: Radius within which Blue actors can defend each other.

maxSpeed.description: Maximum speed an actor can travel per tick.

aggression.description: Multiplier for the Red actors' chase force.

visualRange.description: Radius within which Blue actors can see friends for Cohesion/Alignment.

protectedRange.description: Radius within which Blue actors try to avoid each other (Separation).

centeringFactor.description: Strength of Cohesion (moving towards the center of neighbors).

matchingFactor.description: Strength of Alignment (matching velocity with neighbors).

turnFactor.description: Strength of turning away from screen edges.

minSpeed.description: Minimum speed a Blue actor tries to maintain.

displayDetectionCircle.description: Toggle drawing of detection radius for Red actors.

displayDefenseCircle.description: Toggle drawing of defense radius for Blue actors.
